title: The muses sacrifice
author: Davies, John, 1565?-1618.
publisher: Printed by T.S. for George Norton, and are to be solde at his shoppe, vnder the Blacke-bell within Temple-barre,
notes: Running title: The muses sacrifice, or, Diuine meditations.
Dedicatory verse signed: Iohn Dauies of Hereford.
